entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
